accept-declaration.required: You can't make a complaint on behalf of someone else without consent. If you don't have consent, don't use this service

required.default: Enter the applicant's date of birth

applicant.true: Your date of birth cannot be in the future

future.default: The applicant's date of birth cannot be in the future

complaint-type.required: Select the main reason for your complaint

where.required: Enter where the incident took place

complaint-details.required: Enter the details of the complaint

complaint-phone-number.required: Enter the telephone number that was called

complaint-date.required: Enter the date of the call
complaint-date.future: The date of the call cannot be in the future

phoned-from.required: Enter the telephone number that the call was made from

country.required: Enter which country the visa application centre was in

city.required: Enter which city the visa application centre city was in

reference-numbers.required: Enter which reference numbers do you have

service-centre-city.required: Enter which UK city the premium service centre was in
